clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For prevention of renal transplant rejection and for the treatment of aplastic anemia

contraindications.disease: The most commonly reported adverse reactions occurring in greater than 10 of patients are pyrexia chills rash thrombocytopenia leukopenia and arthralgia
